# lyne-toggle-multi



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property                         | Attribute             | Description                                                                                                                                           | Type      | Default               |
| -------------------------------- | --------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | --------------------- |
| `checkedToggle` _(required)_     | `checked-toggle`      | Decides which option should be initially checked.                                                                                                     | `string`  | `undefined`           |
| `disabled`                       | `disabled`            |                                                                                                                                                       | `boolean` | `undefined`           |
| `eventId`                        | `event-id`            | Id which is sent in the click event payload                                                                                                           | `string`  | `undefined`           |
| `firstOptionIcon`                | `first-option-icon`   | The icon name for the first radio option, choose from the small icon variants from the ui-icons category from here https://lyne.sbb.ch/tokens/icons/  | `string`  | `undefined`           |
| `firstOptionLabel` _(required)_  | `first-option-label`  | The label for the first radio option                                                                                                                  | `string`  | `undefined`           |
| `firstOptionValue` _(required)_  | `first-option-value`  | The value for the first radio option                                                                                                                  | `string`  | `undefined`           |
| `icon`                           | `icon`                | Define if icons should be shown or not                                                                                                                | `boolean` | `false`               |
| `label`                          | `label`               | Label text for the radio group (visually hidden).                                                                                                     | `string`  | `'Radio Group Label'` |
| `name`                           | `name`                | The name attribute to use with the radio group elements                                                                                               | `string`  | `undefined`           |
| `secondOptionIcon`               | `second-option-icon`  | The icon name for the second radio option, choose from the small icon variants from the ui-icons category from here https://lyne.sbb.ch/tokens/icons/ | `string`  | `undefined`           |
| `secondOptionLabel` _(required)_ | `second-option-label` | The label for the second radio option                                                                                                                 | `string`  | `undefined`           |
| `secondOptionValue` _(required)_ | `second-option-value` | The value for the second radio option                                                                                                                 | `string`  | `undefined`           |
| `showIcons`                      | `show-icons`          | Decides whether icon should be shown or not                                                                                                           | `boolean` | `undefined`           |


## Slots

| Slot                     | Description                     |
| ------------------------ | ------------------------------- |
| `"firstOptionIconSlot"`  | Slot for the first option icon  |
| `"secondOptionIconSlot"` | Slot for the second option icon |
